summary: 7-phase implementation plan for eliminating 12 sorries in ZornFamily.lean. Phase 1-4 (Steps 0-3) eliminate 9/12 sorries with 90% confidence by removing broken F/P fields and simplifying the seed. Decision checkpoint after Phase 4 enables pivot to DovetailingChain if Phase 5-6 (controlled Lindenbaum) proves intractable.

artifacts.summary: 7-phase plan: delete false lemmas, remove F/P fields, simplify seed, decision checkpoint, controlled Lindenbaum extension
